attributes.additional_details: There have been hundreds of thousands of people that have had their practical driving tests cancelled due to COVID-19 and they still haven't been able to rebook new tests due to this.
attributes.background: We would like you to extend the theory certificates for another year due to the impact of COVID-19. There have been hundreds of thousands of people that have had their practical driving tests cancelled due to COVID-19 and they still haven't been able to rebook new tests due to this.
